headline: Ingersoll Rand (NYSE:IR) Posts Q1 Sales In Line With Estimates But Stock Drops
summary: Industrial manufacturing company Ingersoll Rand (NYSE:IR) met Wall Street’s revenue expectations in Q1 CY2025, with sales up 2.8% year on year to $1.72 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $0.72 per share was 2.1% below analysts’ consensus estimates.

raw.headline: Ingersoll Rand (NYSE:IR) Posts Q1 Sales In Line With Estimates But Stock Drops
raw.summary: Industrial manufacturing company Ingersoll Rand (NYSE:IR) met Wall Street’s revenue expectations in Q1 CY2025, with sales up 2.8% year on year to $1.72 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $0.72 per share was 2.1% below analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: Ingersoll: Q1 Earnings Snapshot
summary: The Davidson, North Carolina-based company said it had profit of 46 cents per share. Earnings, adjusted for one-time gains and costs, came to 72 cents per share. The results fell short of Wall Street expectations.

raw.headline: Ingersoll: Q1 Earnings Snapshot
raw.summary: The Davidson, North Carolina-based company said it had profit of 46 cents per share. Earnings, adjusted for one-time gains and costs, came to 72 cents per share. The results fell short of Wall Street expectations.

headline: Ingersoll Rand Reports First Quarter 2025 Results
summary: DAVIDSON, N.C., May 01, 2025--Ingersoll Rand Inc. (NYSE: IR), a global provider of mission-critical flow creation and life science and industrial solutions, reported strong first quarter 2025 orders, revenues, and free cash flow.

raw.headline: Ingersoll Rand Reports First Quarter 2025 Results

headline: Trane Technologies PLC (TT) Q1 2025 Earnings Call Highlights: Strong Revenue Growth and ...
summary: Trane Technologies PLC (TT) reports robust Q1 2025 results with 11% organic revenue growth and a 26% increase in adjusted EPS, despite challenges in China and the transport segment.
